item.name: Crystal_Heart
item.logic: CRYSTALPEAK + ((CLAW + (DASH | SUPERDASH | WINGS | FIREBALL | SCREAM)) | (WINGS + (DASH | FIREBALL | SCREAM)))

item.name: Dream_Gate
item.logic: UPPERRESTINGGROUNDS + DREAMNAIL + CLAW + CROSSROADS + LEFTCITY + HOWLINGCLIFFS + FUNGALWASTES

item.name: Glowing_Womb
item.logic: CROSSROADS + ((SUPERDASH | ((FIREBALL | SCREAM | DASHMASTER) + DASH)) + (CLAW | WINGS | INFECTED))

item.name: Grubberfly's_Elegy
item.logic: CROSSROADS + LOWERKINGDOMSEDGE + CLAW + WINGS + SHADOWDASH + SUPERDASH + ACID + LOVE + TRAM + SIMPLE1

item.name: King_Fragment
item.logic: ANCIENTBASIN + UPPERRESTINGGROUNDS + CLAW + DASH + WINGS + SUPERDASH + DREAMNAIL

randomizer.macro: FIREBALL | QUAKE | Grubberfly's_Elegy | Glowing_Womb | Spore_Shroom | Weaversong | Mark_of_Pride | Cyclone_Slash | (Dash_Slash + DASH)
TRAM + (Crossroads_01[top1] | Crossroads_50[left1] | RestingGrounds_02[top1] | Ruins2_10b[right1] | ((Ruins2_04[left2] | Ruins2_11_b[right1] | Ruins2_07[right1]) + (CLAW | WINGS)))

TRAM + ((Abyss_02[right1] | Deepnest_East_01[right1] | Deepnest_East_02[top1] | Abyss_03_c[right1]) | (CLAW + (Fungus2_25[right1] | Fungus2_25[top2])) | ((CLAW | WINGS) + (Deepnest_01b[top1] | Deepnest_01b[top2] | Deepnest_42[top1] | Abyss_04[bot1])))
(Ruins1_01[left1] | Ruins1_04[bot1] | Ruins1_05b[bot1] | Ruins2_04[left2] | Ruins2_10b[right1] | Ruins2_11_b[right1] | Ruins2_07[right1]) + (CLAW | WINGS)
((Ruins2_04[left2] | Ruins2_11_b[right1] | Ruins2_07[right1]) + (CLAW | WINGS)) | Ruins2_10b[right1] | Crossroads_50[left1] | ((UPPERTRAM | RestingGrounds_02[top1]) + QUAKE)

Crossroads_01[top1] | (CLAW + (ACID | SUPERDASH) + Crossroads_35[bot1]) | Crossroads_18[bot1] | Crossroads_04[right1] | (LANTERN + Mines_33[right1]) | Crossroads_45[right1] | Crossroads_06[door1] | UPPERTRAM | LEFTELEVATOR
Fungus3_01[top1] | (CLAW + Fungus3_44[bot1]) | Fungus3_44[door1] | ((ACID | (CLAW + SUPERDASH)) + Fungus3_03[left1]) | Fungus3_02[right2] | Fungus3_26[top1] | Fungus3_26[right1]
Fungus3_26[top1] | Fungus3_26[right1] | (SHADOWDASH + (Fungus3_01[top1] | (CLAW + Fungus3_44[bot1]) | ((ACID | (CLAW + SUPERDASH)) + Fungus3_03[left1]) | Fungus3_02[right2]))

((DASH | CLAW | WINGS | SUPERDASH | FIREBALL | SCREAM) + Fungus2_01[left1]) | (ACID + Fungus2_33[left1]) | Fungus2_06[top1] | (CLAW + QUAKE + Fungus2_21[right1]) | ((Waterways_01[top1] | (CLAW + SUPERDASH + (Waterways_07[door1] | Waterways_14[bot2]))) + (CLAW | WINGS) + Fungus2_23[right2]) | (CLAW + Fungus2_15[left1]) | ((CLAW | WINGS) + (Deepnest_01[bot1] | Deepnest_01[left1]))
((CLAW | WINGS) + (Deepnest_East_01[right1] | Abyss_03_c[right1] | LOWERTRAM)) | Deepnest_East_02[top1] | Deepnest_East_03[left1] | Deepnest_East_07[left2]
Waterways_01[top1] | ((CLAW | WINGS) + Waterways_09[left1]) | (CLAW + WINGS + Room_GG_Shortcut[top1]) | (CLAW + SUPERDASH + (Waterways_07[door1] | Waterways_14[bot2]))
Ruins1_01[left1] | Ruins1_04[bot1] | Ruins1_05b[bot1] | Ruins2_04[left2] | Ruins2_10b[right1] | Ruins2_11_b[right1] | Ruins2_07[right1] | RIGHTELEVATOR

((CLAW + WINGS) + (Ruins1_01[left1] | Ruins1_04[bot1] | Ruins1_05b[bot1])) | Ruins2_04[left2] | (CLAW + Ruins_House_03[left2]) | Ruins2_10b[right1] | Ruins2_11_b[right1] | Ruins2_07[right1] | RIGHTELEVATOR
(QUAKE + Mines_01[left1]) | Mines_02[left1] | (CLAW + SUPERDASH + Mines_10[left1]) | ((SUPERDASH | (WINGS + DASH)) + Mines_28[door1])

CROSSROADS | GREENPATH | (FUNGALWASTES | Fungus2_01[left1]) | (((CLAW | WINGS) + DASH + QUEENSGARDENS) | (DASH + Fungus3_22[right1])) | LEFTELEVATOR | RIGHTELEVATOR | UPPERRESTINGGROUNDS | ((CLAW | WINGS) + DEEPNEST) | ((CLAW + WINGS) + ANCIENTBASIN)
